description:
Lina`s party gets to Saylague to rescue Gourry. Saylague was destroyed by the battle with clone Rezo, but now it`s revived as the town of the dead by Fiblizo`s magic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jaakunaru Wana! Maboroshi no Shiryou Toshi!
Le piège diabolique ! (La ville aux âmes mortes)
O capcană cumplită / Misteriosul oraş al stafiilor
Sinister Trap! The Mysterious City of Ghosts!
邪悪なる罠! 幻の死霊都市!
